title: Day of the evil gun
brief_description: When Forbes’ (Arthur Kennedy) family is kidnapped by Apache Indians he enlists the help of his gun-slinging neighbour Warfield (Glenn Ford) and a scout called Jimmy Noble (Dean jagger) in a rescue bid to get his family back. What follows is a sequence of events that will change the personalities of each of the men leading to an eventual showdown. Cast also includes John Anderson, Harry Dean Stanton, Paul Fix, Nico Minardos.
